title: How Does MSI Keep Coming Up With These?
description: *Video Sponsor* Check out Deepcool AK series air coolers here:   Checking out ANOTHER crazy MSI Gaming Pre-Built.  Thanks so much Carey for helping with this video!  Here is a link to Carey's channel:   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode! Dawid Does Minecraft Name: Mctenthiddy, server IP: mc.tenthiddy.com It works on Java version 1.19.3  Support the channel on Patreon:    *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
